name: MeningococcalDiseaseTestsForNeisseriaMeningitidisAntigenByImmunohistochemistry
title: Meningococcal Disease (Tests for Neisseria meningitidis Antigen by Immunohistochemistry)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Neisseria meningitidis antigen by Immunohistochemistry),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: VSAC query: meningitidis ag immune stain),(Exclusion Criteria: none)
